trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the component associated with this attribute has been inherited from a base class.
trans-unit.target: Angir om komponent som er knyttet til dette attributtet er arvet fra en basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
InheritanceAttribute represents the type and level of inheritance of a member.
trans-unit.target: InheritanceAttribute representerer typen og nivået for arvingen for et medlem.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService> searches the component fields of a component to identify fields that are inherited from a base class, the method represents the inheritance level of each component using an InheritanceAttribute.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService>Søk feltene komponenten for en komponent for å identifisere felt som er arvet fra en basisklasse metoden representerer arv hver komponent ved hjelp av en InheritanceAttribute.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class with the specified inheritance level.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref> klassen med det angitte arv-nivået.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> that indicates the level of inheritance to set this attribute to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"> </xref> som angir gjeldende arv skal angis for dette attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the default value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited"></xref>.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet oppretter en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som angir den tilknyttede komponenten ikke er arvet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Override to test for equality.
The object to test.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis objektet er den samme. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hashcode for this object.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current inheritance level stored in this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det gjeldende arv nivået som er lagret i dette attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> stored in this attribute.
Specifies that the component is inherited.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet oppretter en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som angir den tilknyttede komponenten arves.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies that the component is inherited and is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Angir at komponenten er arvet og er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited and read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet oppretter en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som angir at den tilknyttede komponenten er arvet og skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om gjeldende verdi for attributtet er standardverdien for attributtet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis gjeldende verdi for attributtet er standard. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the component is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Angir at komponenten ikke er arvet.

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet oppretter en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som angir den tilknyttede komponenten ikke er arvet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Converts this attribute to a string.
A string that represents this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
